critique: The executive order aims to convey a sense of seriousness and determination in addressing a threat to national security and foreign policy. It invokes legal authority and outlines specific actions to be taken against individuals and entities undermining stability in the Western Balkans. The order seeks to instill a sense of urgency and resolve in protecting U.S. interests and promoting democratic governance in the region. The primary emotions conveyed are concern (fear) regarding the threat and determination (lack of joy) to address it. There might be a hint of disgust towards the corruption and undermining of agreements. There is no surprise intended.
